Three Months Ended Twelve Months Ended

Effective June 30, 1995, the Company consummated its acquisition of Security Bancorp, Inc. ("Security") by exchanging 612,516 shares of its common stock and $1,990,269 in cash for the outstanding shares of Security common stock in a merger of Security with and into the Company. The Company had previously acquired 5% of the outstanding shares of Security. The total purchase price including expenses totaled approximately $9,257,000. The merger was accounted for as a purchase. (dollars in thousands, expect per share amount)
For the twelve months ended December 31, 1995

Habersham Bancorp owns Habersham Bank, Cornelia, Georgia and Security State Bank, Canton, Georgia. It also owns BancMortgage Financial Corp, Atlanta, Georgia, a subsidiary of Habersham Bank, a full service mortgage banking company and the Advantage Group, Inc., Cornelia, Georgia, which provides management consulting advice to depository institutions. The Company acquired Appalachian Travel Service, Inc., Cornelia, Georgia, as a subsidiary of Habersham Bank on September 9, 1996.
